maml:description.maml:para: Returns information about a Wiki page
Returns information about a Wiki page

Returns an array of all links on a page

The full page name for which to return the data

maml:description.maml:para: Gets an array of all pages from an instance of DokuWiki.
Gets an array of all pages from an instance of DokuWiki.
Returns the available versions of a Wiki page.
Returns the available versions of a Wiki page. The number of pages in the result is controlled via the recent configuration setting. The offset can be used to list earlier versions in the history

used to list earlier versions in the history

used to list earlier versions in the history

Returns the raw Wiki text for a specific version of a page

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a list of recent changes since given timestamp
Returns a list of recent changes since given timestamp. As stated in recent_changes: Only the most recent change for each page is listed, regardless of how many times that page was changed

maml:Description.maml:para: Get all pages since this timestamp
Get all pages since this timestamp

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a list of recently changed media since given timestamp
Returns a list of recently changed media since given timestamp

Gets any current connection to a DokuWiki API

maml:description.maml:para: Locks a DokuWiki page for 15 min
Locks the page so it cannot be modified by users for 15 min. Also works for non-existent pages (block create name)
